verses.roman:
ūnaviṁśe-mathurā haite prayāga-gamana
tāra madhye śrī-rūpere śakti-sañcāraṇa

synonyms: ūnaviṁśe—in the Nineteenth Chapter; mathurā haite—from Mathurā; prayāga-gamana—going to Prayāga; tāra madhye—within that; śrī-rūpere—Śrī Rūpa Gosvāmī; śakti-sañcāraṇa—empowering to spread devotional service.
translation: In the Nineteenth Chapter, the Lord returned to Prayāga from Mathurā and empowered Śrī Rūpa Gosvāmī to spread devotional service.
